Fri Dec  1 10:15:56 PST 2017

  * Add support to export prices via MD -> Save CSV

Sample CSV
Price,Ticker_ISIN
58.7700,GB00B0CNH270:GBX
112.5200,GB00BYYV0405:GBX
1.0400,IE00BD2M9K78:GBP

unzip hleOfxQuotes-gui-Build_20171201_160.zip
  to get
hleOfxQuotes-gui-Build_20171201_160-exec.jar

Need Java 1.8

java -jar hleOfxQuotes-gui-Build_20171201_160-exec.jar
  Update prices
  In price table: popup menu MD -> Save CSV
